football.name: CMC Sports Base - Synthetic Court 1
football.description: The CMC sports base in Cluj-Napoca offers for rent a synthetic football field with dimensions of 41x22m.
football.facilities: Parking, terrace, bar, changing rooms, showers, WC, lighting, electronic scoreboard, balls and game shirts.
football.address: Augustin Bunea Street, No. 1, Gruia district, Cluj-Napoca

football.name: Unirea Sports Base - Large Football Court
football.description: One of the most complex sports bases in Cluj Napoca, located at the edge of the forest. It has a synthetic court of official dimensions approved by FRF, 3 football fields with synthetic surface, 3 tennis courts, all being equipped with nightstand. Size - 104 x 62m - 11 x 11 - can be divided into 3 plots of 34 x 62m - 7 x 7.
football.facilities: Parking, terrace, bar, changing rooms, showers, stands, WC, lighting, WiFi.

tennis.name: Tenis Club Cluj Ciprian Porumb 1
tennis.description: The club has two tennis courts, locker rooms, showers, a reception area and a refreshment area. In winter, the grounds are covered with a state-of-the-art double-walled balloon. You can enjoy refreshments, beer, even food (pizza, pasta, salads, etc.) after training, all on a beautiful and carefully arranged terrace.
tennis.facilities: Parking, terrace, bar, changing rooms, showers, WC, lighting, covered ground, WiFi.
tennis.price: Between 8-16: 85 lei / hour, Between 16-23: 120 lei / hour
tennis.address: Augustin Bunea Street, No. 1, Gruia district, Cluj-Napoca

tennis.name: Unirea Sports Base - Tennis Court 1
tennis.description: Tennis Base Unirea offers tennis courts with clay surface, covered during the winter, with heated and presostatic structure. The fields have a surface with high quality slag, the athletes have a terrace where they can relax after the game, locker rooms, wi-fi, and parking.
tennis.facilities: Parking, terrace, bar, changing rooms, showers, WC, lighting, WiFi.
tennis.price: Between 07-16: 100 lei / hour, Between 16-24: 120 lei / hour

tennis.name: OH Sports Complex
tennis.description: The OH Sport complex is the first private gym in Cluj-Napoca and is located in Manastur district. The main large hall has an area of 600 square meters. It is versatile, being equipped with everything necessary to practice a lot of indoor sports such as tennis, volleyball, basketball, badminton etc.
tennis.facilities: Parking, terrace, bar, changing rooms, showers, stands, WC, lighting, WiFi.
